thread.title: US teenager breaks into set of Orange Is The New Black to take stunning photos |
thread.title_full: US teenager breaks into set of Orange Is The New Black to take stunning photos | The Advertiser

author: Sophie Aubrey
title: US teenager breaks into set of Orange Is The New Black to take stunning photos |
text:
SAMANTHA Gardella might just be the first Orange Is The New Black fan to score herself an official “shot” — and she couldn’t be happier to be in the naughty corner.
The talented 19-year-old snuck into the set of the popular Netflix prison drama and roamed the premises recreating famous scenes by combining her own printed screenshots with the real-life scenery.
Perfect match ... Show favourites Alex and Piper get some one-on-one time. Source: Supplied
Taste of fame ... Gardella, a film student, strikes a pose with Donnie Wahlberg. Source: Supplied
She uploaded her photo series to her Tumblr page. And they are stunning.
Gab fest ... Four of the Latina girls hang out by a brick wall. Source: Supplied
So stunning, that they’ve caught the eye of the makers of Orange Is The New Black , who recently released their third season .
The show’s official Twitter page playfully issued Gardella with a “shot” — a written punishment given to prisoners — from fictional corrections officer John Bennett.
To the kid who snuck onto the #OITNB set: Game recognize game. http://t.co/pn8WjtaL5k pic.twitter.com/T6tEOWa67a
— Orange Is the New... (@OITNB) July 2, 2015 The faux document outlines the ‘offence’: “Illegally entered Lichtfield Correctional Institution set. Took fantastic photos featuring scenes from OITNB. Posted said photos to her personal Tumblr.”
And naturally, Gardella is utterly stoked.
“I had to do a double take and make sure that the tweet was actually about me,” she told News Corp Australia
“Then right away I ran to my kitchen to show my dad and sister what just happened. It’s so surreal.”
On the road ... Officer Scott O’Neill frames up nicely. Source: Supplied
Smoke break ... Inmates Dayanara and Gloria take some time-out together. Source: Supplied
The devoted fan said when she discovered the set location was at an abandoned children’s psychiatric centre only 50km from her home in Monroe, she couldn’t help but drive over and check it out.
NAKED NEWBIE: Ruby Rose a big hit with OITNB fans after her nude scene
When she got there, it was as easy as walking in.
“To my surprise there was no gate blocking the entryway, so anybody is able to get on the property,” she said.
“There was also no signage stating ‘Do Not Enter’.”
And she wasn’t alone, also finding other fellow fans were wandering the set.
Green thumbs ... Inmates get into gardening in the green house. Source: Supplied
Road-side ... Sister Jane and Joe Caputo standing where they do in the show. Source: Supplied
The video production student said her idea was inspired by a similar style of photography she saw using a scene from The Walking Dead .
“I just wanted to share the set experience with other fans that don’t have the luxury of living near by,” she said.
Loo break ... Kooky inmate Mei gets some alone time. Source: Supplied
Like a glove ... Gardella manages to make the grounds meld together perfectly. Source: Supplied
Originally published as Teen breaks into OITNB set for pics
